name: Jungle Sphere:Remade
description:
In January 7th, 2021 I Released The Very First Game I Managed To Finish-Jungle Sphere(It Was Finished Way Before, I Just Still Did Not Have The Idea Of Releasing Stuff Publicly Then).

The Game Is Unfortunatly Drafted However That Is For Good, Because In The Itch Page For It I Called It "The Worst Game Ever Made" And That Is Kinda True, Bad Graphics , Content Lacking, Boring, Music That Can Put Me In Jail, And Other Issues.

So I Decided To Remake It!

-Better Graphics!

-Much More Content!

-Actually Original Music

-And More!

It Is Still Just Nothing More Than An Endless Runner, However It Is DEFINITLY Way Better Than The Original. Still Dont Believe Me? Than Take A Screenshot Of The Original!

Yep, It Hurts!

Anyway, Go Download! Its Free!

(Most) Textures From: https://ambientcg.com/

Source Code: Coming Soon!
